text: Pheri yadi yo thaha huncha ki yi duvaile kunai aparadha gareka chan bhane tiniharu juna manisaharuko adhikara hanan garna khojeka thi'e, tiniharumadhye du'ijana tiniharuko tha'umma saksi banun, jo ki (mrtaka) najikako sambandha rakhdachan, ani tyasapachi tiniharu allahako sapatha linu parnecha ki tiniharuko gavahi uniharuko sapathabhanda badhi satya cha ra hamile kunai kisimabata satyatako ullanghana gareka chainaum, yadi yasto gareko bha'e hami an'yayi hunechaum
